summary: Upon learning she has an autistic brother she is convinced is unjustly behind bars for a brutal murder, a lawyer sets out to prove her sibling's innocence - only to uncover even more life-changing secrets in the process.
cast: Matteo van der Grijn|Fedja van Huêt|Derek de Lint|Monique van de Ven|Thijs Römer|Victor Löw|Angela Schijf|Maartje van de Wetering|Daan Aufenacker|Sabine Soetanto|Jaap Spijkers|Joop Keesmaat|Mike Reus|Ali Ben Horsting|Marie-Louise Stheins|Aus Greidanus Jr.|Truus te Selle|Lieke-Rosa Altink|Daniel Verbaan|Astrid van Eck|Rick Nicolet|Ernst Dekkers|Jara Lucieer|Krijn ter Braak|Johan Siefken|Jeroen De Man|Ernst ter Linden|Zentveld Gert|Rutger Kroon|Fayene Frind|Sammie Bouma|Loes Kok|Fairy Morgaine|Paul Joosse|Wiets Verhoeven
keywords: family secret|mother son relationship|based on novel|flashback|autism
title: El secreto de Iris
